experiences.description: Full-stack and mobile development focusing on educational platforms
relevant_achievements: Developed text-to-speech feature in iOS using native engine and JS bridge, serving 10K+ DAUs across educational resources
Enhanced user engagement by 75% through implementing data synchronization across web and mobile platforms
Reduced API response times by 40% by optimizing Redis-based caching for user content
Enabled real-time language switching through localization, expanding audience by 30% through multi-region support
Architected a flashcards feature with Swift UI, enabling users to search, favorite, share and download
all_achievements: Developed text-to-speech feature in iOS using native engine and JS bridge, serving 10K+ DAUs across educational resources
Enhanced user engagement by 75% through implementing data synchronization across web and mobile platforms
Reduced API response times by 40% by optimizing Redis-based caching for user content
Enabled real-time language switching through localization, expanding audience by 30% through multi-region support
Architected a flashcards feature with Swift UI, enabling users to search, favorite, share and download
Increased test coverage from 40% to 75% using Jest, significantly improving code reliability
Cut deployment time by 50% by reducing lambda bundle size and improving CI/CD speed
Maintained backward compatibility while adding new content through API versioning
Integrated a differential diagnosis API with search, filter and sort functionality, reducing diagnosis search time by 40%

experiences.description: Full-stack and mobile development focusing on turf booking system
relevant_achievements: Automated turf booking and recording with 2 Flutter apps and ReactJS admin panel, ranking top 25 in sports apps
Enhanced data protection via Firebase authentication with Google and OTP OAuth logins, increasing user acquisition by 25%
Increased user engagement by 40% through real-time notification delivery via Firebase Cloud Messaging
Optimized turf discovery by 30% through search and filtering via Google/Apple Maps API
Enhanced transaction flow by integrating with Stripe API, increasing revenue by 25%
all_achievements: Automated turf booking and recording with 2 Flutter apps and ReactJS admin panel, ranking top 25 in sports apps
Enhanced data protection via Firebase authentication with Google and OTP OAuth logins, increasing user acquisition by 25%
Increased user engagement by 40% through real-time notification delivery via Firebase Cloud Messaging
Optimized turf discovery by 30% through search and filtering via Google/Apple Maps API
Enhanced transaction flow by integrating with Stripe API, increasing revenue by 25%
Developed high-performance turf booking system with <200ms response time using OpenAPI REST API
Implemented JWT authentication & role-based authorization, increasing secure access by 70%
Enabled users to share turfs by implementing universal links and deep linking, increasing user acquisition by 25%
Enabled users to stream videos by developing a network video viewer module, enhancing user engagement
Optimized video delivery using Cloudflare CDN & AWS S3, reducing load times by 40%
